introduction.name: Daniel Asta
introduction.text: Full Stack Developer specialized in React and Node. I love learning and teaching technology on my blog. Currently learning Japanese よろしくおねがいします。

highlightProject.title: Grow Meeting
highlightProject.description: Jitsi video chat integration with Websockets to provide real time interactions.

projects.title: Apartmentfy
projects.description: This proof of concept is made with Next.js, MongoDB Atlas and Chakra UI. Enjoy the power of Static Site CDN and Serverless DB.

projects.title: Covid Radar
projects.description: A simple predictive model and tracker for COVID-19 Spain cases.

projects.title: My blog about tech
projects.description: Personal Blog made with Next.js, supports Dark Mode, optimistic UI, SEO friendly and more.

projects.title: Congress Crush
projects.description: Match 3 game about political elections in Spain made with Godot for Android and Web.

projects.title: Copywriting
projects.description: Blazing fast landing page built with Next.js and multilanguage support to advertise copywriting services.

projects.title: Nimbel
projects.description: Portfolio and Blog for the startup Nimbel Software, made with Next.js following jamstack architecture.

projects.title: Tesla Spreadsheet
projects.description: A Tesla web generated with Google's Spreasheet, create, edit and release directly from a spreadsheet following jamstack architecture.

projects.title: Pokemon TCG Shop
projects.description: Web app to check and search Pokemon Trading Card Game card prices, proof of concept made to teach Redux Toolkit.

projects.title: Handy Tools
projects.description: A collection of web tools to make your life easier. PWA made with Next.js and Chakra UI. Made to teach Chakra UI.

projects.title: This Portfolio
projects.description: Personal Portfolio made with React and responsive design with CSS.

projects.title: Rank ^ Up
projects.description: Spanish community of Dota 2 with news, tutorials, gameplays and live broadcast.

professionalExp.shortDescription: Project management, team coordination and implementation of new features in front end, back end and mobile.
items: Created the necessary architecture to deliver the web and mobile apps in any language with a few steps.
Unit, Integration and E2E testing development.

professionalExp.shortDescription: Technical analysis, development and training for web applications in the notary sector.
items: Analysis, planning and development of migration projects from Sencha ExtJS to React.
Development of new applications in React.
Creation of a component catalogue for use across the company.
Creation of tools in an architectural way that offers transversal solutions to the different teams involved in technological change.
Implementation of automated unit tests.
Training in Javascript, React/Redux and Agile methodologies.
Use of SCRUM, eXtreme Programming and personal efficiency improvements.

professionalExp.shortDescription: Full stack developer for the planning, analysis, development, management and evolution of the digital signature web platform in the bank.
items: Frontend development and backend services.
Coordination and management of the team, tasks and workloads.
Coordination and management between different vendors.
Elaboration of functional and technical documentation.
Quality control of code, unit tests and end-to-end tests
Customer requirements taking.
Presentation of the project and its different extensions in the client.
Reference person at the technical level of the project.
Participation in functional and technical meetings.

professionalExp.shortDescription: Development of new products for the management of scientific production of the Spanish scientific community.
items: Development of backend services and frontend services.
Database maintenance and development.
Unit tests of the developments.
Training for new employees and junior profiles.
